refnamediv.refpurpose: Changes the name of all the objects listed by adding the specified new_ prefix.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Changes the name of all the objects listed by adding the specified new_ prefix. All references to the objects will also be changed. The mvall command performs a similar function.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the prefix command to change the names of specified objects and all references to them.

example.title: Change the names of specified objects and references to them.
example.para: Changes the names of objects group1, regiona, and shapeb to test_group1, test_regiona, and test_shapeb. All references to these objects will reflect the new names.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
